list_definition.definition: a group of people legally selected to hear a case and to decide what are the facts, eg whether or not a prisoner accused of a crime is guilty

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The verdict of the jury was that the prisoner was guilty of the crime.

list_definition.definition: a group of judges for a competition, contest etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The jury recorded their votes for the song contest.
